resources.string: Congratulations, you have solved the puzzle in %s.\n\n Your score: %d
Are you sure you want to restart this game?
Are you sure you want to give up and show the solution?
Are you sure you want to exit? (Unsaved changes will be lost)
Enter a name for this puzzle
Highlight values which have a contradiction on board.
Displays count of each number placed.
Edit cell value and note in popup.
Select a number, then just tap on a cell to set its value or note.
Select a cell, then just tap on a number to set the cell\'s value or note.

There are several input modes which you can use to fill in the puzzle. In order to help you get familiar with these modes there will be several hints displayed as you go through them.

You can disable these hints in the game settings.
This menu contains certain actions to help you with the puzzle. Warning: Applying these actions may reduce your final score.\n

You're now in the Popup input mode. Tap any cell to edit its content.

Notice the button in the lower right corner. You can use this button to switch to another input mode.

You're now in the Single number input mode. First select any number button by pressing it. Then tap on cells in which you want to have selected number filled.

Press the note button to toggle the cell's note editing.

You're now in the Numpadinput mode. First select any cell by tapping it. Then tap on the numbers you want to fill the cell with.

Press the note button to toggle the cell's note editing.
You don\'t have to use all input modes. You can disable any of them in the game settings.\n

Hints

Hints that guide you through the application controls will be shown the first time you encounter them. You can disable these hints in the game settings. Disabling then re-enabling hints will reset them

Highlighting

You can highlight or unhighlight a cell by double tapping it

Actions

The actions tab in the menu gives you several actions to help you solve the puzzle. Be warned that using these actions may reduce your final score.

Input modes

You can switch between several input modes using button in the lower right corner of the screen. You can also disable any input mode in the gamesettings.

Popup input mode

A popup dialog is shown when you tap the cell.You can edit the cell's content using this dialog.

Single Number input mode

First select any number button by tapping it. Then tap on cells in which you want to have selected number filled.

Use the notes button to toggle between cell's value and note editing.

Numpad input mode

First select any cell by tapping it. Then tap on the numbers you want to fill the cell with.

Use the notes button to toggle between cell's value and note editing.
Show hints which will guide you through application controls.
Display time taken since the puzzle was started.
Highlight the row and column of a touched cell.
Highlight buttons for numbers which have been entered 9 times.
